source.name: Mordenkainen's Fiendish Folio, Volume 1: Monsters Malevolent and Benign
source.author: Bil Benham, Bart Carroll, Mike Mearls
source.description:
Crawling from the darkest recesses of D&D's history comes a ferocious menagerie of monsters malevolent and benign!
These creatures first appeared in the Fiend Folio for first edition AD&D. Now, thanks to your support of Extra Life, they enter the world of fifth edition D&D.
